content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my kids basketball game and speaking to another parent outside when an unusual bright light in the sky caught my attention...I was intrigued by it and thought it was comet ison. the object did not move for several hours.

i took a picture from 149th street and brook avenue in the bronx but the light was also photographed and seen in virginia by my buddy on facebook. my family from brooklyn also saw object. did a little research and its not the first time this has happened in the bronx.
content.summary: Uknown object in sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were in kalama going to a friends house. we turned up the wrong street and decided to turn around. as we were doing this, above a tree i notice two red orb like lights heading in a north to south direction. they seemed to be equidistant from one another. they moved very slow in the sky. after about 1min-1 1/2min, the lead red sphere dissipated. it seemed like it just fizzled out. the second followed suit about 3 seconds later. once they disappeared, my friend and i started to head towards our friends. i looked over to where i saw them first and sure enough, a third shows up. this one was the same color but started in more of a east to west direction. about 10 seconds of observing it going in that direction, it shifts its direction to the same as the other two. the change wasn't gradual, it was very abrupt. after the direction change, we watched the object for about another 30-45 seconds then the object fizzled out like the other two.
content.summary: 3 red orbs above kalama

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo, asteroid or super nova.

saturday may 4th,2013.
fire ball in the sky. 03.13 a.M. 
nichols blvd, and east cherry street. central islip, ny, 11722.

whilst returning to my home in long island, ny. from work in queens ny, i was one block away from my house, while on nichols blvd and east cherry street, i was observing the moon in its quarter period at 03.13am on the morning of may 4, 2013, looking towards the eastern sky while driving south, a bright light like a star caught my eyes on the left of the moon at about 40 degrees apart, 
 
the light began glowing and twinkling and appeared to be shifting about, as it form bigger than the point of light as it first appeared, it look like it was heading towards my direction to the west and began to get bigger and changing colors, it first looked white and then start changing into an orange, redish, greenish and black color and radiating, it appeared to be the size of my fist outstretched and it then explode into a bigger fireball which began to travel along the ecliptic plane in a southernly direction in many pieces of fireballs,

from that point of viewing while pulling of to the side of the road the object appeared to be breaking up with glowing debris separating from the main object, at that point i then  remembered to use my phone camera to get a picture, but i then realized that it was charging, by the time i unplug and turn on the phone thinking it was in the video camera mode. i turned the camera towards the objects dis-interagrated into points of light going south. 
 i was a very disappointed after realizing that the camers was in the still shot mode and i did not get a clear picture to show to my family and friends as proof of my sighting, the one picture i took i then sent, 2 text messages out, one to my friend and co-worker allan asencio and my wife judy phillip.

the following days i began to look at the various news channel and you tube, and nasa, for any reports of this fireball, and nothing was found to be related, what i saw is unique to me, but no proof of the sighting make the reporting obsolete.

i am compelled from within myself to post this observation at this later date of the sighting, from may 3rd 2013 to today, dec 3rd 2013, what i saw is awesome to me, and i hope that some one, somewhere did observe this event, and with the expertise and access to investigate by mufon from nasa / esa, maybe some light can be shed on this subject,i stand by my obervations, maybe a super nova that occured millions of years ago, now being visible, i would like to know, thanks,
content.summary: Fire ball explode in the eastern skies, like a super-nova explosion

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with a friend and noticed a fire ball like object up in the sky. so , i pulled over to observe it as i was watching this fireball object it went straight up in the evening sky right before night time. i seem it very clear so did my friend. as it got higher in the sky the fire seemed to what appeared to be burning out . after the fire was no longer there i could see a perfect black in color disk shaped ufo! right after i observed this object out of nowhere another fireball object just appeared right in front of my eyes , i was so stunned because , it literally just appeared . that alone was scary for me because , i couldn't explain where it came from! then it seemed to hover in one place as it too looked like a fire ball. then it followed in the same path as the other one before it. as it went up up and up it seemed to burn out and you could also see very clearly a black dark disk shaped ufo and it seemed to have a little wobble to it. it was the sane as the other one we both just witnessed ! i know what i seem and i wasn't alone either and my friend seen the sane thing and it was one of the most strangest things we've seen together ! i live in florida and a lot of ufo have been reported here. in february of 2012 my entire neighborhood seen a very extremely large ufo hovering over a neighbors house across the street and a beam of light shot out an orb looking object and it just descended into the night! we've seen a lot in this area and still to this day at night we can see these ufos in our night sky . we all need to start paying attention and look up at our skies because, something's going on and i personally feel like we're not alone and i can't help to wonder if we are as safe as we think we are and i feel scared l knowing that there are things up in our skies that are observing us and it feels like we are the ones being watched! who is it? and what is it? are we safe? what do they want? who else is seeing them too?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen a fire ball up in the sky then after it went up another one appeared out of nowhere and went up and fire went out and was two ufo disks .

content.detailedDescription: I was with my son outside showing him where to find m81 in the sky. i looked down just for a moment and my son shouts out look dad did you see that. i asked him what he's talking about when then tells me about the red lights he just saw. they formed a pattern like three lights in middle like triangle and one light on each side. as they moved the lights on the outside started  to wave side to side my son said.
content.summary: Saw red lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was with my son outside showing him where to find m81 in the sky. i looked down just for a moment and my son shouts out look dad did you see that. i asked him what he's talking about when then tells me about the red lights he just saw. they formed a pattern like three lights in middle like triangle and one light on each side. as they moved the lights on the outside started  to wave side to side my son said.
content.summary: Saw red lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us were walking in a public park looking to photograph wildlife and birds. we noticed something shiny in the sky above us (a bit north) so we used the camera to focus on it and take a photo. checked the camera to see if we got a photo and then went to take another photo but the object was gone. we were seeing planes in the sky the entire time we were there and they all were very clearly leaving vapour trails. this object was not. additionally, it was stationary while we saw it. it was there for one minute and gone the next. husband's report on the photo:

"basically, this is the canon raw file loaded into photoshop for pre-processing (contrast tweaked a bit so it's easier seen). the top image is the entire photograph, the focus point is centered directly on the "object". taken right at sunset, so the sun was reflecting off this object. jets in the atmosphere were producing contrails this evening, there is no associated contrail with the "object", and it was also extremely "high up", which leads me to believe it was outside of our atmosphere. however, it's too big to be a satellite and iss' orbit didn't take the station overhead of us this evening, so it's not iss. the second image is the photographed zoomed into 100%, centered on the object, and the third image is zoomed into 400% (as far as it'll go). showing a "boomerang" shape. so... we have a boomerang shaped object reflecting sunlight and outside of the atmosphere... and it was a fast shutter, 1/400th, and taken at 400mm. interesting to note, that spacex did launch a falcon 9 rocket from florida this evening however it's definitely not the falcon 9 rocket, or the ses-8 payload that was launched this evening. my camera thinks it's currently 8:26am, and the actual time is 7:26p. the raw file is timestamped at 6:11am, which means it was taken at 5:11pm. the rocket launch was at 5:41pm."
content.summary: We were on a hike, looking for wildlife, saw something shiny above us (bit north) focused camera and snapped a shot, looked at the photo..Went to grab another photo and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: On my way back home from a local drive. where i had just purchase something to eat.I pulled out into the main road hwy 100 going west.As soon as i got on the hwy, i saw a big bright light to my left. up in the sky. it was hard not to see because there were no stars out at the time. when i got to old alice st. i got on it and went south on it. i could see the light just hovering .Which to me it seem to be in the direction of olmito, texas. i then called the cameron county sheriffs dept. to report it. at first i thought it was a weather balloon. but it was kind of windy. and this light was just hovering.It would get dime and then real bright.After about 20 minutes i just went inside. then at about 8:20pm. i went back to check and it was gone.
content.summary: Big bright light with some sort of wings hanging over the side of light

content.detailedDescription: We were driving the high road from santa fe to our home in santa fe county.  it was the largest and brightest think in the sky on the e/se sky line.  the outer band of lights were green and the inner ring was red.  the both seemed to be moving and pulsing.  the interior of the circle was all white lights, a lot of them.  we saw it both on 12/1, 12/2 and again it's out there tonight.  the exact same place, same lights, same pulsing, but tonight it must be closer because its a lot bigger than the previous 2 nights.  each night i've witnessed this it has show up after 6 pm local but i don't know how long it stays there.  i've tried to photograph it but it always looks like a dot on the picture but is very very large when viewing it.  don't understand that part, but...
content.summary: Clear black night sky, then one huge lighten object appeared in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very clear night, and i saw the very bright light from inside my house through a window.  i went outside on the front porch, and the light was maybe 25 degrees above the sw horizon and stationary.  it was much brighter than any star i have ever seen.  my wife and 2 neighbor kids said they could see blue sparkles around it.  i could not (too old).  over the next 30 minutes it slowly moved to the wsw until it passed beyond the trees.  the total movement from my point of view was very slight over that time.  because i could still see it by going upstairs, we could estimate its height over distance by considering the relative position of the object from the 2 viewing positions.

the only possible alternative explanation would be a police helicopter, but one would expect it to move at some point or see the light move if it was searching for someone.  no sounds were heard by any of us.

because we could clearly see jets flying between ny and atlanta passing far above it, i would estimate the height at 5-20k feet, perhaps 3-10 miles distant, which would place it near or above silver spring, md, if any other reports come in.

if interested, i have a picture taken from inside my home using a flash to orient the position in the sky.  the light can be seen through a window even with the flash!
content.summary: Exceeding bright light with blue sparkles moving very slowly sw.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 19 years old i went on a hunting trip with my uncle and his friend roger in the sierra mountains at the walker river area in california.
we were camping and i made a comment about how clear the sky was and if ufos were real we would have a good chance of seeing one tonight.
my uncle's friend roger who worked as an engineer for litton, said that ufos were real.  back in 1953 or 1954 when he was working on a project for litton at edwards afb, president eisenhower flew in from palm springs one early afternoon.  there were several dignitaries present with him for this meeting including some representatives from the archdiocese of los angeles a couple of congressmen and military officers. they all went into a building.  roger asked an mp at the gate if he knew what was going on.  the mp told roger that there was a meeting going on between the group of dignitaries and people "not from this world". the beings had picked the united states because they had seen our atomic bomb.  the mp told roger that the people "not from this world" were negotiating a deal with the united states which was a trade for technology in exchange for the united states agreeing to become the "caretakers of the world". later that afternoon the mp and roger saw everyone including president eisenhower come out of the building but never saw the "other worldly beings".  they watched president eisenhower's plane fly away.
content.summary: While on a hunting trip my uncle's friend told me about a meeting between eisenhower and other wordly beings

content.detailedDescription:
It came from the heavens from a southeastern direction.It had a very white trail ,as it got closer it got real wide sorta like a onion shape right before it popped out of the white stuff it was making.All i could see was a dark round looking object coming out of the white trail.
i was hunting deer off the eight mile post rd. at the time,sitting on a bucket.My feeling was it's a ufo because i saw one before come in just like that while hunting in nov 14,15 2007.It was actually triangle shaped.The difference is that one came on down a landed.This one i lost sight of.I speculate it would have come on down near dixon memorial state park area called big turn around.
content.summary: Looked just like the china sighting a few years ago.

content.detailedDescription:
Mon evening, dec 2, 2013 at exactly 10:00 p.M. i saw a glowing green orb descend nearly vertically while driving south of fredericksburg tx on hwy 16. i was just at the fair grounds about a mile from the city limits, so at first i assumed it was a plane on the approach path to the airport, which i was approaching. i saw it in the se sky but it was so large i thought it was near. another witness saw the same thing at the same time at intersection of us hwy 87 and ih-10 at comfort tx
it made no noise, left no trail. it looked like a roman candle falling to the ground, though much larger. my first thought is that it was a part falling from an airplane on approach to the runway. there was no way to judge size or distance. it was very smooth in path and appearance. it disappeared beneath the treetops. i rolled my window down anticipating an explosion, crash, or fire. but on the remaining 7 mile drive through that area i saw or heard nothing further.
content.summary: Observed a glowing green orb descend nearly vertically from 25 degrees to horizon

content.detailedDescription: Outside my house with a friend saw lights and filmed. they changed directions and vanished. lihhts did not flash or blink and made no noise
content.summary: Came frpm west fast then slowed headed south and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
On october 23, 1998 while captain of a twa airliner on route from st. louis to san diego the co-pilot and i observed through the cockpit window, a white ball of light straight ahead.  i radioed air traffic control for traffic ahead.  air traffic control told me the nearest traffic ahead was over 360 miles but there was a continental airliner 5 miles behind us.
the ball of light was to the left of the cockpit window, then shot to the right, then back to the left, and traveled straight up and over us at a high rate of speed.  the captain of the continental airliner behind us remarked over the radio, "what the heck was that!"

file 1: high altitude enroute map with highlighted area our twa airliner was over during sighting of the object.
content.summary: While captain on a twa airliner i observed through the cockpit window, a very bright white light ahead which was not an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello my name is [name removed/cms/tg]. my sister and her friends are the real witnesses to this. the sightings were in two different occasions. the first sigthing was when my 23 year old sister and her guy friend where relaxing in her car one day just hanging out and at the moment they got out of the car they describe seeing a white cylinder floating just above them. she describes it as being like a floating cigarette. it hovered away behind some hills and they lost sight of it. the second encounter was at night when supposedly my sisters friend and his younger brother (who are also her neighbors) heard some strange screams outside their house. you really cant see anything back there at night. there is nothing but hills and mountains behind those houses.
anyways they went out with a pellet gun and a flashlight to check out what the noises were? then suddely they enconunterd what they describe as being two huge bigfoot type creatures standing infront of them but at a near distance. supposedly they shot at them with the pellet gun but they say the creatures didnt even flinch. so they ran back scared to their house. after that he went directly with my sister to tell her the story. thats all i know. i trust my sister and she wouldnt make up a story like this. im gonna do a bit more of investigating on what these guys actually saw. but please do keep record of this. we appreciate you guys being here. not to many people will believe a strange story like this. thanks you.
content.summary: Cylinder ufo and bigfoot like creatures

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside, always look at sky, low clouds moving in, turned to look north west and spotted two lights in sky, seemed close, one was purple in color the other bright white. the white light then zoomed toward the purple colored light which brightened with the approach, the white light then circled the purple light stopping momentarily in three locations around the purple. the purple transformed momentarily to white, seemed to be crippled as it maneuvered poorly. the white light continued to move around, towards and away.
  went inside to recover cell phone for camera, got a couple of stills but the objects descended over horizon, the purple maneuvering in circular motions only.
  could have been private uav's with lights attached? as the motion was similar to radio control, speed and air time seemed excessive for these types of vehicles, lights seemed to brighten just in advance of movement.

   do not have camera at this time or would include stills.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects purple to white pulsating one flying around other

content.detailedDescription:
In 1988 while co-pilot on a twa airliner air traffic control asked us to make a 40 mile course change to the north which we did.  a few minutes later the captain and i saw what looked like a large bluish and lavender hologram appear over area 51 just south of our flight path.  it appeared to be approximately 5 miles high and 1/4 to 1/2 mile wide.  small objects which resembled whitish/yellow fire flies came from behind and above our aircraft making a fast 90 degree turn descending into the base of the large hologram.  there were more than 10 small objects and maybe as many as 30 that descended into the hologram.  they traveled so fast it was hard to determine how many there were.  the entire incident only lasted about 20 to 25 seconds.  i asked the captain "did you see that?"  his reply was "neither one of us saw that."
file 1: sketch of hologram
file 2: high altitude enroute map with highlight of approximate location of the twa airliner when the sighting occurred.

*i don't remember what month or day this incident occurred, but i believe it occurred in 1988 or 1989. this report required a month and day be filled in to enter the sighting information.
content.summary: Large bluish/lavender hologram rising from area 51 with small objects ascending into it.

content.detailedDescription:
First let me say that we are in a no flight zone as we are very close to a nuke plant. 5:44 pm est november 25, 2013. my husband called me to come outside to the back yard. every day and into the night he has an hourly smoke on the back porch, so he is very familiar with the skies and flight paths ect. anyway, he pointed out a stationary ufo which had blue and white or very light yellow flashing lights around the perimeter. it was about 8 to 10 miles away in the south and 400 feet above us. it was hovering above a forested hill and was there for at least two minutes.
within 4 seconds it was over us. there was a very bright white light underneath and you could barely see the blues on the edges anymore due to its location to us. however the smaller lights around the large white one almost seemed recessed as it flew above us. the back lights were more distinct in their outline. my husband believed it to be triangular in shape. he had been outside in the dark longer so his eyes were able to see edges better than mine.
it was difficult to determine size due to the fact that we could not see the elevation. however, given the following perhaps you could make a calculation of how high it was: our property is 150 feet long, so looking up from underneath the ufo, it was covering at least 75 feet of the property and the probably 35 feet of the 45 foot width of the property. it seemed to come directly from the mountain south of us which is a good 400 feet or more above us and 10 miles away from us. it moved south to north and its acceleration was not uniform as it was stationary over the mountain and then was upon us in 4 seconds (so 10 miles in 4 seconds), it slowed when directly over us, it didn���t hover but it slowed enough for us to get a good look and be able to agree on a uniform description. it accelerated again, however it was slower than a jet but much faster than a small plane or copter. 
i cannot emphasis enough how large the center light was in proportion to the vehicle and how white and brilliant the light was, it was amazing. if we had stared at the light itself for any time we would have been blinded by it.
at 6:35pm my husband witnessed another similar object move to the northwest and he only saw it's edges which were also rimmed with lights. this moved so fast that he could not yell for me to come and see it.
content.summary: Triangle ufo with enormous center white light

content.detailedDescription: Spotted a pulsing light as i was pulling into my driveway and rushed off to grab my camera, a canon powershot xs50 capable of 200x zoom.  notice the glide path left to right. originally the orb was pulsing, which you'll see in the first few seconds of the video. from 1:14 - 1:22 you'll see characteristic orb shaping. my battery went low on my canon sx50 so i went and grabbed my igen nv 20/20 night vision (did not set it up to record via my laptop as i was concerned the object would go away) and went behind the house. it went stationary for a few minutes, glided back to the left and then descended out of the horizon. the entire time it is also distancing itself from my position, so the orb is getting smaller. no idea how far away...It was over pocahontas state park (virginia's largest forest habitat). was able to observe it off and on during a 30 minute period.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb at first pulsating. glide path left to right, then stationary, then left, then descent

content.detailedDescription: This was taken by someone i know on facebook, not sure of the details.
content.summary: Did not witness

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driveing down maine dr to my house and notices strainge craft above low ying so we stoppend and watched. as got closer we toook photos of it as the 3rd very lg light came one with beam . it slowly fflew over with a ligjt buzzor humming noise . hard to see actual shape cause ligjts so bright but looks rectangle or possible triangle . gave me anxioty for long time and i worked at major jet port in this state n this was nothing like ive seen befor . i have a few photos not blury either .If wanted...I am on an ipod and it will not let me post the photos . if u send me an emailnaddress i can send the pics rite out . sorry i could not post on here i ould realy like for u to see them .... thanks u .J.M.
content.summary: At 1st 2 med lighs the 3rd very lg ligjt came one with beam out front straitght. as flew over have photos

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house on birchwood dr. midland, ontario. i and my friend were going to bed at 2-3 in the morning. we slept on the sofa's in their livingroom. at the front of the house you could see one of their neighbours house across the street and a forest in their backyard. there are some more expensive houses by the water hidden behind the trees. i went to look out the window as i normally do when i go to bed and i seen a yellow glowing orb hovering above the trees. i called my friend over to take a look and we watched it land in the forest. we couldn't see it after it had landed. i wanted to go out there but we would have woke my friends dad so we just went to bed. i dont visit that friend much anymore but there must still be some sort of evidence in that forest. i wondered why they landed, still do was it because they wanted me, my friend their neighbours or maybe nothing at all. the reason i believe it was most definitly a ufo is because of the experiences i had with them after, such as one star-like ufo sitting still then splitting in 2 it was like somthing off star wars.
content.summary: Yellow orb lands

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i separated earlier this year and she rented a house that is in the vicinity of crane naval base in indiana. we decided to work things out so i started spending time with her at her house. the time these events occurred happened during a weekend but i can't recall the exact date but it was sometime in september 2013. we were inside the house watching tv and we heard what sounded like thunder so i went outside to check out what i thought was a thunderstorm. i could see what seemed to be a large thunderstorm heading straight towards us, our prevailing wind at that time of year comes from the southwest so i'm going to say that it was coming from the southwest heading northeast. but without actually being there with a compass in my hand i cannot verify for sure that was the correct direction. it seemed like a very intense storm to me so i decided to watch it as it came in as i am infatuated with watching storms. as i watched the wind picked up and i would say that it was blowing a steady 20mph and gusting to 30mph. after watching the storm for about 30 minutes i noticed that it was still hovering in the exact same place, directly over crane naval base. i then started to pay closer attention to the lightning, it was rhythmically pulsing a flash about every 10 seconds. it would do this for a couple minutes and then it would just randomly start to flash. i never seen any actual bolts of lightning just the light inside the clouds which at some points looked to be very low to the ground. the thunder was very loud and deep, rolling out a very long time and every now and then it would give off a sudden very loud bang of thunder. the atmosphere and the air felt electrified and just very thick and heavy. it was seemingly difficult to breathe at times and i felt somewhat dizzy at times while watching this. i watched this for probably 3 hours steady, until midnight or a little after when my wife made me come to bed. i was woke up several times throughout the night by the thunder and each time i got up and went outside and it was exactly the same as when i first started watching it at around 9 pm. i woke up about an hour before dawn and watched it until daylight and it was like you flipped a switch at daylight the whole thing stopped and the sky cleared up. the next night the exact same thing happened only my wife joined me in watching this time. as this was happening we decided to check the local radar and although there was what seemed to be a severe thunderstorm happening the news showed clear sky's. i attempted to video this on my phone and my camera malfunctioned and would not work, my wife's camera was also malfunctioning on her phone so we were unable to record this at all. i was able to take one photo at the very beginning of the edge of this storm right at dusk. we were unable to use our cameras after this photo was taken. i feel personally as if the government was conducting some kind of weather modification experiment as this happened 2 nights in a row and the storm just hovered over the naval base and started at dark and abruptly ended at daylight.
content.summary: Pulsating lights and rumbling sounds almost thunderstorm like hovered over crane naval base for at least 8 hours. pulses were rhythmic and could be timed. there were times when lights were random also.

content.detailedDescription: It was a giant fire ball it made whole valley light up like day and no sound
content.summary: It looked like the sun come out and down to earth at 2 am

content.detailedDescription:
Went out side tonight to have a cigarette. i was out side about 10 minutes when what i thought was stars, actually were bright orange in color, they were moving.. had to been 20 or more of these moving lights. they came from  the sw.. i thought we were being invaded seeing all of them hovering.
i ran in my house to get my cell phone, took two videos and several still photos of the sighting.
they stayed a good 6-10 minutes,and one by one the vanished upward.. i stayed until they were all gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange lights movning in formation, hovered then 1 by one vanished.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went to bed for the night in our master bedroom in the upstairs of our house. we had just sold our house and were getting ready to move so our bed was just a mattress on the floor. i like to fall asleep listening to something in my headphones, so i was lying in bed trying to fall asleep listening to coast to coast am. i have trouble sleeping ever since coming back from iraq. i know i had been lying there for at least an hour because of how far along in the show it was. i wasn't even sleepy yet so i was just listening intently to the show with my eyes closed when the audio started going in and out. it was then that the feeling that i wasn't alone came over me. i was lying on my ride side with my wife to my back, i opened my eyes and the room was lit in a pale orangish glow. i rolled over towards my wife and that was when i saw 3 typical grey aliens standing in my master bathroom about 5 feet from my wife's side of the bed. i couldn't make out their faces. but i knew what they were from their big heads and how thin they were. i could see their outlines perfectly because of the orange glow that was emanating from the bathroom window that they were standing in front of. i could tell they were wearing some kind of tight fitting suit that was a darker color than their grey skin. i immediately started screaming, "what the f%$#, what the f%$#!" as i grabbed my wife in fear. she woke up and started screaming and then broke into prayer in here first language, romanian. the 3 entities de-materialized into 3 orange glowing balls and floated through the walls of the bathroom. my wife was screaming," what's going on." the orange glow faded quickly as soon as the last orb passed through the wall. about 3 seconds later there were 3 quick bright flashes of white light that came through all 4 of the windows in the bedroom and it was over. we had a room mate that shared a wall with our bedroom that never even woke up and i was screaming like i was in the middle of a firefight. my wife and i got up and looked out of the windows immediately but saw nothing. needless to say i didn't sleep the rest of the night.
content.summary: 3 greys in my room

content.detailedDescription: It was a seemingly usual night. i was on my way back from delivering a pizza going southbound on beacons view to el dorado. as i approached the stop sign i saw an unusual object in the sky above the treeline of friendswood. i sat at the stop sign for several mins to observe the object. ellington air field is not far away and there is a private airstrip in friendswood so i was used to seeing planes and helicopters on a daily basis. however, this object did not behave like any plane or helicopter i had ever seen. the object seemed to be triangular in overall shape, perhaps the size of a football field. on the side there were somewhat bright yellow-ish lights, 4 if memory serves right. it hoovered stationary for about a min, then abruptly moved approximately 300-500 ft at a time, to several nearby locations, forming a kind of triangle flight pattern. it hoovered for several seconds at each location before moving very quickly out of sight to the se. it happened relatively quickly.  i'm glad i stopped to witness this event, just wish i had a camera.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered above tree tops about a mile away. began moving, then changed direction 2-3 times before quickly disappearing to se

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I pulled aside the road on state route 86 mile marker 108 for a break and noticed what i thought was a satellite in the sky.  i quickly realized it was too low and moving slightly faster. after my observation i noticed a less bright light in front, once i realized this i noticed the object blocking out the stars in between the two lights and i relised it had a physical shape. once i took more interest i quickly turned off the radio and listened and noticed there was no sound.  i was able to hear a vehicle coming from miles away and not the object. once i did this the object changed its flight pattern. after monitoring the object for approximately another minute i left.
content.summary: Large cigar shaped object, no sound flying low, changed direction, blocked out stars. i am a federal agent trained in surveillance and tracking, often working with aircraft....Plz contact.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my nephews back yard on thanksgiving night. i was starting to walk under the gazebo when i noticed something flying overhead and thought to myself that it did not look like plane lights so i went to the other side of the gazebo to take another look. what i saw was a pulsating white light with green blue and red streams of light pulsating from the object. i called my nephew over to look and he thought the same way as i did we could not figure out what it was. then it seemed like seconds later two or thee more appear out of the southeast moving to the northwest. then at least 10 more appeared all looked exactly the same. we counted 15 in all and watched them for what seemed like a while but probably was less than it seemed. my nephew video taped the whole thing on his phone.
content.summary: I noticed lights in the sky and thought it was no plane or miltary aircraft and told my nephew to look and he thoght the same then three more  in all a total of fifteen bright objects that seemed close
